pr_title: CB-9625 enable rest logging on request response pairs. This using a n…

timeline.message: CB-9625 enable rest logging on request response pairs. This using a new filter where we can enable on deployment level this logging. RestLoggerFilter can be improved with new fields if we need that.

timeline.bodyText: Do we need it as a separate enum?
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: I thought it is nicer this way. Should I remove it ?
replies.author: doktoric

timeline.bodyText: Usually, this is private final static Logger LOGGER and usually, we are not using getClass(), but setting it to the class directly
timeline.author: akanto

timeline.bodyText: DateFormate is not thread safe! You cannot use it as a member variable in a filter.
timeline.author: akanto

timeline.bodyText:
2020-11-09 15:04:43,771 [http-nio-9091-exec-1] anonymize:34 INFO  c.s.c.c.a.AnonymizerUtil - [type:springLog] [crn:] [name:] [flow:] [requestid:75737203-c895-4fc1-b357-2975722d3b3d] [tenant:] [userCrn:] [environment:] [traceId:] [spanId:] Anonymize the content with length: 2 2020-11-09 15:04:43,772 [http-nio-9091-exec-1] anonymize:34 INFO  c.s.c.c.a.AnonymizerUtil - [type:springLog] [crn:] [name:] [flow:] [requestid:75737203-c895-4fc1-b357-2975722d3b3d] [tenant:] [userCrn:] [environment:] [traceId:] [spanId:] Anonymize the content with length: 15 2020-11-09 15:04:43,773 [http-nio-9091-exec-1] doFilterInternal:62 DEBUG c.s.c.l.RestLoggerFilter - [type:springLog] [crn:] [name:] [flow:] [requestid:75737203-c895-4fc1-b357-2975722d3b3d] [tenant:] [userCrn:] [environment:] [traceId:] [spanId:] startTime: 14:04:26.385  endTime: 14:04:26.536  duration: 151 ms  httpMethod: GET  path: /cb/health  queryString: null  clientIp: 127.0.0.1  request: {}  responseStatus: 200  response: {"status":"UP"}  
Unfortunately, thenant Id traceId and such things were not filled out.
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: ok let me reorder the filters mdc must come first
replies.author: doktoric

timeline.bodyText: Log should be pushed through anonymization.
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: the request and response pairs are already anonymized do we all other field as well ?
replies.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText: Oh, I haven't seen it, so I guess then it should be fine.
replies.author: akanto

timeline.bodyText:
Do we want to have this multi-line log approach separated by \n?  I am not sure how easy to parse and handle from fluentd.
@oleewere @sodre90
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: on mow environment, the message part is reformatted inside a json, so technically it always using a json parser, does not matter what. is inside that. also from some time - because of this change: d0aad2d - the logs are joined based on some metadata informations not by '\n' in the end of the docker logs events
replies.author: oleewere

timeline.bodyText: Logging should be added here, just to ensure that we see if something is wrong...
timeline.author: akanto

timeline.message: CB-9625 enable rest logging on request response pairs. This using a new filter where we can enable on deployment level this logging. RestLoggerFilter can be improved with new fields if we need that.
